links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=1,...,73
prog: (PARI) je=[]; for(n=1,300000,s=sigma(eulerphi(n)); if(isprime(s),je=concat(je,n))); je(PARI) { n=0; for (m=1, 10^9, if(isprime(sigma(eulerphi(m))), write("b062514.txt", n++, " ", m); if (n==73, break)) ) } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Aug 08 2009]
author: Jason Earls (zevi_35711(AT)yahoo.com), Jul 09 2001
